oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bodenmüdigkeit beim apfel
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Henfrey, J.
Baab, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The low input means for controlling replant disease under evaluation at DLR Rheinpfalz (Competenzzentrum Gartenbau Rheinbach) are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Henfrey, J. and Baab, G. (2013) Bodenmüdigkeit beim apfel. Obstbau, 2013 (15), pp. 29-31.
